message_1: What is the SHA-256 hash value of the message "Hello World" in hexadecimal notation?
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash value of the message "Hello World", we can use a programming language or an online tool. Here's the Python code to do it:

```python
import hashlib

message = "Hello World"
hash_object = hashlib.sha256(message.encode())
hash_hex = hash_object.hexdigest()

print(hash_hex)
```

The SHA-256 hash value of the message "Hello World" in hexadecimal notation is: `64ec88ca00b268e5ba1a35678a1b5316d212f4f366b2477232534a8aeca37f3c`
